Entity.Name: IDbEntity
Entity.summary: Base interface for all database entity objects which track the creation and modification dates as well as implementing the and interfaces.

Property.Name: CreatedOn
Property.summary: Gets or sets the database entity creation date/time.
Property.value: The date and time when the database entity was created.
Property.remarks: For local databases, this value is the system- date and time. For upstream (remote) databases, this is the UTC date and time.

Property.Name: ModifiedOn
Property.summary: Gets or sets the database entity modification date/time.
Property.value: The date and time when the database entity was last modified.
Property.remarks: For local databases, this value is the system- date and time. For upstream (remote) databases, this is the UTC date and time.

Entity.Name: IAccessError
Entity.summary: Generic interface for access error entities.

Property.Name: Id
Property.summary: Gets or sets the primary key value.
Property.value: The unique identifier used as the current entity's primary key the database

Property.Name: ErrorCode
Property.summary: Gets or sets the error code.
Property.value: The value that represents the numeric error code.

Property.Name: Message
Property.summary: Gets or sets the brief error message.
Property.value: The brief error message.

Property.Name: Details
Property.summary: Gets or sets the error detail text.
Property.value: The error detail text.

Property.Name: Target
Property.summary: Gets or sets the target entity to which the access error applies.
Property.value: The object that this error applies to.

Entity.Name: IAccessError{TTarget}
Entity.summary: Generic interface for access error entities with a specific target type.
Entity.typeparam: The type of the entity that the access error applies to.

Property.Name: Target
Property.summary: Gets or sets the target entity to which the access error applies.
Property.value: The object that this error applies to.

Entity.Name: IFileSystem
Entity.summary: Interface for entities which represent a specific file system type.

Property.Name: Id
Property.summary: Gets or sets the primary key value.
Property.value: The unique identifier used as the current entity's primary key the database

Property.Name: DisplayName
Property.summary: Gets or sets the display name.
Property.value: The display name of the file system.

Property.Name: CaseSensitiveSearch
Property.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether file name searches are case-sensitive.
Property.value: true if file name searches are case-sensitive; otherwise, false.

Property.Name: ReadOnly
Property.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is a read-only file system type.
Property.value: true if this is a read-only file system type; otherwise, false.

Property.Name: MaxNameLength
Property.summary: Gets or sets the maximum length of file system name components.
Property.value: The maximum length of file system name components.

Property.Name: DefaultDriveType
Property.summary: Gets or sets the default drive type for this file system.
Property.value: The default drive type for this file system.

Property.Name: Notes
Property.summary: Gets or sets the custom notes for this file system type.
Property.value: The custom notes to associate with this file system type.

Property.Name: IsInactive
Property.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this file system type is inactive.
Property.value: true if this file system type is inactive; otherwise, false.

Property.Name: Volumes
Property.summary: Gets the volumes that use this file system.
Property.value: The volumes that use this file system.

Property.Name: SymbolicNames
Property.summary: Gets the symbolic names of the current file system.
Property.value: The symbolic names that are used to identify the current file system.

Entity.Name: ISymbolicName
Entity.summary: Interface for entities that represent a symbolic name for a file system type.

Property.Name: Id
Property.summary: Gets or sets the primary key value.
Property.value: The unique identifier used as the current entity's primary key the database

Property.Name: Name
Property.summary: Gets or sets the symbolic name.
Property.value: The symbolic name which refers to a file system type..

Property.Name: Notes
Property.summary: Gets or sets the custom notes for the current symbolic name.
Property.value: The custom notes to associate with the current symblic name.

Property.Name: Priority
Property.summary: Gets or sets the priority for this symbolic name.
Property.value: The priority of this symbolic name in relation to other symbolic names that refer to the same file system type, with lower values being higher priority.

Property.Name: IsInactive
Property.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this symbolic name is inactive.
Property.value: true if this symbolic name is inactive; otherwise, false.

Property.Name: FileSystem
Property.summary: Gets or sets the file system that this symbolic name refers to.
Property.value: The file system entity that represents the file system type that this symbolic name refers to.

Entity.Name: IVolume
Entity.summary: Interface for entities which represent a logical file system volume.

Property.Name: Id
Property.summary: Gets or sets the primary key value.
Property.value: The unique identifier used as the current entity's primary key the database

Property.Name: DisplayName
Property.summary: Gets or sets the display name of the volume.
Property.value: The display name of the volume.

Property.Name: VolumeName
Property.summary: Gets or sets the name of the volume.
Property.value: The name of the volume.

Property.Name: Identifier
Property.summary: Gets or sets the unique volume identifier.
Property.value: The system-independent unique identifier, which identifies the volume.

Property.Name: CaseSensitiveSearch
Property.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether file name searches are case-sensitive.
Property.value: true if file name searches are case-sensitive; false if they are case-insensitive; otherwise, null to assume the same value as defined by the file system type.

Property.Name: ReadOnly
Property.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current volume is read-only.
Property.value: true if the current volume is read-only; false if it is read/write; otherwise, null to assume the same value as defined by the file system type.

Property.Name: MaxNameLength
Property.summary: Gets or sets the maximum length of file system name components.
Property.value: The maximum length of file system name components or null to assume the same value as defined by the file system type.

Property.Name: Type
Property.summary: Gets or sets the drive type for this volume.
Property.value: The drive type for this volume.

Property.Name: Notes
Property.summary: Gets or sets the custom notes for this volume.
Property.value: The custom notes to associate with this volume.

Property.Name: Status
Property.summary: Gets or sets the volume status.
Property.value: The volume status value.

Property.Name: FileSystem
Property.summary: Gets or sets the file system type.
Property.value: The file system type for this volume.

Property.Name: RootDirectory
Property.summary: Gets the root directory of this volume.
Property.value: The root directory of this volume.

Property.Name: AccessErrors
Property.summary: Gets the access errors for this volume.
Property.value: The access errors that occurred while trying to access this volume.

Entity.summary: Generic interface for volume access error entities.

Property.Name: Target

Property.value: The entity that this error applies to.

Property.value: The date and time that the MD5 hash was calculated for the current file or null if no MD5 hash has been calculated, yet.

Property.Name: BinaryProperties
Property.summary: Gets or sets the binary properties for the current file.
Property.value: The generic that contains the file size and optionally, the MD5 hash value of its binary contents.

Property.Name: SummaryProperties
Property.summary: Gets or sets the summary properties for the current file.
Property.value: The generic that contains the summary properties for the current file or null if no summary properties are defined on the current file.

Property.Name: DocumentProperties
Property.summary: Gets or sets the document properties for the current file.
Property.value: The generic that contains the document properties for the current file or null if no document properties are defined on the current file.

Property.Name: AudioProperties

Property.Name: DRMProperties

Property.Name: GPSProperties

Property.Name: ImageProperties

Property.Name: MediaProperties

Property.value: The generic that contains the media properties for the current file or null if no media properties are defined on the current file.

Property.value: The generic that contains the music properties for the current file or null if no music properties are defined on the current file.
